feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.17.1
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed error when loading some media from MangaUpdates (#290)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.17.0...v0.17.1

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.17.2
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed calendar page not accesible when there are book events #292 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/d9acd555457329519ff66b482f9408aa42437158)
  • Fixed that some detail pages of seasons were not loading. #293 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/635255eb1695efd5eefc9f6eb0883236d1e24562)
  • Fixed some spacing problems on the media details page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/46f904e441f768c09e6697da6e503e3c77fe6bf5)

Maintenance

  • Bump fakeredis from 2.26.1 to 2.26.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/291

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.17.1...v0.17.2

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.17.3
entry.content:
Features

  • Added a toggle to hide disabled media types from the search bar #296 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/e08f31887c39ac9296699f56057ff1f0ec60f1f7)

Fixes

  • Fixed error when adding item manually #298 (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/d53bb06bef4511dd657b394d486b1224a991b003)

Other

  • Added an empty message to the media details column when no data is available. (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/975b4e91bc2500b8e9a3101df30e5ef490ef7cd4)

Maintenance

  • Bump ruff from 0.8.3 to 0.8.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/295
  • Bump aiohttp from 3.11.10 to 3.11.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/294

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.17.2...v0.17.3

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.18.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Added a statistics page with activity history, timelines and graphs

Fixes

  • Fixed video games labeled "Bundle" are not displayed (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/5060871dbf956811c495855faade5203531bbfb5)

Maintenance

  • Bump ruff from 0.8.4 to 0.9.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/313
  • Bump djlint from 1.36.3 to 1.36.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/299
  • Bump pillow from 11.0.0 to 11.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/304
  • Bump django-debug-toolbar from 4.4.6 to 5.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/308
  • Bump coverage from 7.6.9 to 7.6.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/301
  • Bump django from 5.1.4 to 5.1.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/318

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.17.3...v0.18.0

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.19.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Added periodic imports (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/4067924df98053c1252e84d12c1d31b533df208f)
  • Added two different modes when importing (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/e5c36e47c50cb912f5d002045f1d1de36acdb655):
  • Only import new items
  • Import new items and overwrite existing ones
  • Redesigned imports UI (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/693dcf6c50fee442e6a586a3324756f37eccd67f)

Other

  • Optimized import jobs (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/4b35051659154c5cfc0836f239b760de36e40ba0)
  • Now import jobs results will be shown in the profile page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/b92642b4405fb0b0d6daa4c90b087c88eff77729)
  • Allow custom list collaborators to edit the name and description of the list and add other collaborators (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/e4aefd2479db02d168a6b0f3646d1117ed9f10f0)
  • Removed option to import media from The Movie Database (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/3d2e447d1bcc74b7d7838a28b17cbade6e81bc46)

Fixes

  • Fixed that long synopses were partially hidden (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/b0d5b09a60dcfe3ad2f7fec304bfb9bd84d2e8b9)
  • Fixed app timeout in version 0.18.0 on some devices #324.
  • Fixed not refreshing expired IGDB access token (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/787ce749bdd95620664d4f328470d24a680130ba)
  • Fixed the problem of custom list collaborators not being able to add or remove items #332 in (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/e4aefd2479db02d168a6b0f3646d1117ed9f10f0)

Maintenance

  • Bump psycopg[binary] from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/319
  • Bump django-simple-history from 3.7.0 to 3.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/320
  • Bump ruff from 0.9.3 to 0.9.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/321
  • Bump pytest-playwright from 0.6.2 to 0.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/327
  • Bump beautifulsoup4 from 4.12.3 to 4.13.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/331

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.18.0...v0.19.0
